website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you like its attractive pattern, but be prepared for a few difficulties when you hang it.
pros: Features a classic design with rich color and French flair
Made of thick, durable vinyl that cleans effortlessly
cons: Though pre-pasted, the adhesive isn't very reliable
Its detailed pattern is difficult to match, resulting in wasted wallpaper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this wallpaper to create an accent wall in our master bedroom. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: JenBoz

customer_reviews.title: My my my!
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper is stunning! The vinyl paper is high quality. Prepasted and easy to handle. The match is fairly long, so the waste was greater than 12 inches each strip. I ordered extra and had 1 unused roll left over. Would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Colors are exactly as shown in the photo. The pattern is a larger scale. I was afraid it might be a small scale pattern but it is not. You can't open for a larger view of the swatch. There are metallic gold tones and the base color is a slate/turquoise blue. I'm using it along the stairwell on my first floor. Very happy with purchase and price. I paid someone to hang it but it is pre-pasted and doesn't seem like it would be too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: ginny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize the tan parts of the wallpaper were actually a gold that isn't shiny but changes color with the lighting. The pattern is large and makes it super easy to match each piece. It goes up like a dream. The seams don't show when it is applied. I did my bathroom in 1 afternoon. I have never put up wallpaper so I would recommend this to even an amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia J.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Ohh boy... This is such an elegant piece of art. So much aura once you put it up. Plus it is of very high quality. The color combination would/should accommodate many interior decoration "plays"!
customer_reviews.author: Yojyck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallpaper for my sitting room in my master bedroom. I did not realize how beautiful it is in person. I plan to order more! I not only plan to wallpaper my sitting room, but my whole bedroom. Fast shipping, item as described. Thank-you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Simone S.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty paper
customer_reviews.text: Love this paper for my new “She Porch!” Pre-pasted and had good adhesion just dipped it in water in wallpaper tray a few minutes, booked it to ensure paste was evenly distributed (just softly fold paste sides together a minute or so) unfold and hang. Price was very reasonable and delivered as scheduled! I did have to order an extra roll but got it with no problem
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wall paper
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wall paper. Although I'm not using it to put on my walls. I'm adding it as a backdrop to some built in cabinets and I've also added it as a backdrop to an over the toilet cabinet. Like I said, BEAUTIFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Love4Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Colors don't match
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and they did not match in color. They were slightly off but next to each other you can definitely see the color difference. So disappointed, can't use them now
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my wallpaper. The blue color is lighter than the picture but still looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: raha

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle wallpaper. Very happy with color and design. We added to half of a wall in bathroom as an accent wall.
customer_reviews.author: andrea delgadillo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Oh La La! Love this wallpaper! It is exactly what I imagined it would be - very true to what I saw on screen. The details stand out nicely and the install was pretty simple as well. It worked out well for me since I had a 12' half wall to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S

customer_reviews.text: Great wallpaper.bought this to use as an accent wall in my living room.it looks fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Jrhea

customer_reviews.title: so beautiful. i put it on one wall in my ...
customer_reviews.text: omg.... so beautiful. i put it on one wall in my bedroom but now i think i want to do the whole room that's how pretty it is.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: It was just as expected! Very easy to apply for a first timer and it looks fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Love

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy the same make again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wet the pre-pasted paper. Don't strecth when hanging. Look just like advertised. I'd buy the same make again.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but not Aqua . Mainly blue and beige. Tears very easily and was difficult to hang
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Long repeat, buy more than you think you need. It's worth every Penney.
customer_reviews.author: GRAINNE SALINO

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I read others review before I ordered. It is even more attractive in person! Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Blue islands

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very pretty and color on amazon is pretty close to the actual color
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully subtle pattern, antique in appearance, on a perfect weight vinyl - so light that you could mistake it for paper.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Peterson

customer_reviews.title: but because it's a good quality paper I probably can white wash it
customer_reviews.text: I was just darker than I tough, but because it's a good quality paper I probably can white wash it
customer_reviews.author: anneke Jansen

customer_reviews.title: but the pattern is beautiful and gives that antic chick
customer_reviews.text: I am new at wall paper so was a bit upset that it did not come with the glue as well. but the pattern is beautiful and gives that antic chick. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Aleksei Hukumchand

customer_reviews.title: different shades... not cool.
customer_reviews.text: The wall paper is gorgeous. Better than I expected but once I got it on the wall it doesn't match. this is 4 rolls worth. Not happy how it looks. Now I have to figure out how to cover this up. For $50 a roll it should be dn near perfEct. I feel a refund of some sort would be appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen M. Champley

customer_reviews.title: Great Pattern
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good pattern. I am looking forward to putting it in my bath room. I wish that it was a little more bold. It will make a great accent to my decor.
customer_reviews.author: KSim

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Defective
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Defective! It won't peel off. There's no backing so it's useless. I'm returning it but wish the company would compensate me for my trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The design is beautiful, however it is INCREDIBLY difficult to hang
customer_reviews.text: The design is beautiful, however it is INCREDIBLY difficult to hang. the adhesive on the back does not stick, and it seems there is no glue on the seems, therefore after its dried our seems are already peeling. We followed the instructions to a T, and my husband has hung wallpaper many times before. Not happy to have spent this much money on a product so poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Acker

customer_reviews.title: Sent me the wrong wallpaper!!! Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give 0 stars if I could I ORDERD this beautiful faux blue and gold wallpaper to only find out I wasted so much money to get this instead, highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A Yun

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design very luxurious, I feel like I’m in a fancy hotel with this wallpaper just kinda pricey I didn’t realize how short the wallpaper roll was, it was only enough for about 3 small panels worth so I had to buy more which is pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stunnig, classic, traditional wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: The light beige imbedded into the design, coordinates perfectly with my oak furniture. The traditional pattern gives an opulent French feel to an already stunning understated wallpaper. NOTE: IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR GLITZ & GLAM, this may not be it. It is simply understated elegance...very classic. Great for projecting calming feel for my entry way. Absolutely LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: ebullient

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vintage Quality
customer_reviews.text: I searched through a ton of designs before I decided on this one. I liked that it was a pre-pasted design to make my life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wallpaper French Faux Aqua Blue Large Damask with Gold by Norwall
product_meta.description: First quality, new, pre-pasted Vinyl Coated Wallpaper;Pattern Number CH282488;Priced by the Double Roll, 20.5 inches x 33 feet (56 sq feet);Pattern Repeat 21
feature_bullets: Wallpaper French Faux Aqua Blue Large Damask with Gold by Norwall

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
